Software Organization¶

Cool tree cartoon of main files:

├── LICENSE.rtf
├── MANIFEST.in¶
├── README.md
├── docs
│   ├── Makefile
│   └── _images
│       └── spring.png
├── readthedocs.yml
├── requirements.txt
├── setup.cfg
├── setup.py
└── spacejam
    ├── __init__.py
    ├── autodiff.py
    ├── dual.py
    └── tests
        ├── dualnumbers_test.py
        └── init.py

Overview of main modules¶

  • Dual.py: Overloads basic math operations and returns an automatic differentiation spacejam object
  • DualNumbers_test.py: Test harness for class methods in Dual.py

Tests¶

Unit tests are stored in spacejam/tests/DualNumbers.py and each method in spacejam/Dual.py have their own doctests. spacejam also has TravisCI and Coveralls integration.

These tests can be run with the following command in the root directory:

pytest --doctest-modules --cov=. --cov-report term-missing

Installation¶

Virtual Environment¶

For development, or just to have a self contained enviroment to use spacejam in, run the following commands anywhere on your computer:

python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
  • Check out How to use for a quick tutorial on what you can do.
